c74object.name: vabs~
c74object.description:
vabs~ provides a CPU efficient version of abs~ using SIMD operations.
Use the vabs~ object to take any given signal and output only the absolute (non-negative) translation of that signal (i.e. a rectified waveform). All negative values in the input signal are converted to positive values in the output.

method.name: signal
method.description: The vabs~ object takes an input signal and output only the absolute (non-negative) translation of that signal - all negative values in the input signal are converted to positive values in the output.

entry.name: signal
entry.description: A signal consisting of samples which are the absolute (i.e., non-negative) value of the samples in the input signal.
